articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from third practice and qualifying at the Canadian Grand Prix at Circuit Gilles Villeneuve in Montreal.
articles.title: F1 practice LIVE: Canadian Grand Prix 2025 times, results, radio & updates

articles.description: South Africa beat Australia by five wickets in the World Test Championship final to end their long wait for a major global title.
articles.title: Australia vs South Africa: Proteas win World Test Championship final at Lord's

articles.description: Bath hold off a resilient Leicester to win their first Premiership title in 29 years and also clinch a 2024-25 treble.
articles.title: Premiership Grand Final: Bath beat Leicester 23-21 for first title in 29 years

articles.description: German qualifier Tatjana Maria says it is a "dream come true" to reach the final of Queen's after stunning Australian Open champion Madison Keys.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Qualifier Tatjana Maria stuns Madison Keys to reach final

articles.description: Live text commentary of the United Rugby Championship final between Leinster and Bulls at Croke Park, Dublin.
articles.title: United Rugby Championship Final - Build-up to Leinster v Bulls

articles.description: With Florian Wirtz set to join Liverpool for a club-record £100m, BBC Sport look at where the Germany midfielder will play.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz to Liverpool: Mohamed Salah, Luis Diaz, Dominik Szoboszlai, Darwin Nunez - where will German fit?

articles.description: Sam Burns hits a sensational five-under 65 to set the clubhouse target as Scottie Scheffler battles to make the cut during the second round of the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Scottie Scheffler set to make cut as Sam Burns impresses at Oakmont

articles.description: Former driver Derek Warwick is suspended from his role as a steward at this weekend's Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: FIA suspends race steward Derek Warwick for media comments

articles.description: A detailed look at the figures behind the Fifa Club World Cup, and how investment from Saudi Arabia appears to be underpinning the tournament.
articles.title: Fifa Club World Cup: How Saudi Arabia is underpinning the tournament

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu will not play in this week's Berlin Open as she continues to manage a back problem.
articles.title: Berlin Open: Emma Raducanu withdraws because of back injury
